This site uses Just the Docs, a documentation theme for Jekyll.

Installation

Running Phenesthe requires a prolog installation. Specifically it has been tested under SWI-Prolog 7.6.4. You can download the latest version of Phenesthe using the command below:

git clone https://github.com/manospits/Phenesthe.git

Once downloaded, and provided that you have SWI-Prolog installed, Phenesthe is ready to run. You can confirm that you have a working version of Phenesthe by navigating to the unit_tests folder and run the unit tests.

cd unit_tests
./run_tests.sh
